product_title: Uhomedecor Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese L Army Green
review_body: If your looking for a big jacket this isn't it.  This is more of a tight fit I am a small in U.S and I ordered a large and it fits good. Also the jacket is very light good for when it gets cold in Florida.  Overall very good.

product_title: Uhomedecor Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese L Army Green
review_body: I'm still getting compliments on this jack and have been repeatedly asked where I bought it from. I ordered a Chinese Large and it fits perfectly. To give you a reference, I am 5' 5" and 135lbs. Looks great!

product_title: Uhomedecor Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese L Army Green
review_body: I'm A men's small and I got an xl and it fits perfect!!

product_title: Uhomedecor Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese L Army Green
review_body: Awesome Jacket.  I am 5ft6, 140 lbs, and I got Chinese M size.  Initially I got the Chinese L, but the fit was kinda too baggy for my liking.  I returned it and got the Chinese M, which fits really nice, not too baggy, which I feel makes the look of the jacket even better.  It is quite stylish and the craftsmanship is not bad, coming from a China.  The sleeves are slim, but the waist part is a bit baggy for my liking.  Nontheless, I still like it because of how cool it looks.  For the price, you cannot get a better deal.I bought the green, and liked it so much, I also purchased one in black.

product_title: Uhomedecor Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese L Army Green
review_body: First off Its really  a Decent quality jacket, a good  deal considering the low price, and it looks nice on. But like most foreign clothing the sizing is tricky, OK so I'm a average build 5'8 male not necessarily wide in the shoulders, I'm actually sort of a slim build all around. I would normally buy a US. Men's size small Jacket and it would fit and then some. But this said to order 2 sizes larger so I ordered a large. Upon receiving the item it was still too small being short on the arms, and in the shoulders. So honestly I would recommend buying 3 sizes larger for a good fit. It seems kind of crazy but you probably will need  it.

product_title: Uhomedecor Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese L Army Green
review_body: I love this jacket. It arrived before expected. I wear small and I ordered large. It fits perfectly. The only thing, be careful if you use a drier, mine shrunk.

product_title: Uhomedecor Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese L Army Green
review_body: The sizing is off, I knew this when I ordered but I only went one size up. I recommend getting two sizes larger than you would usually buy for this to fit properly. My only complaint is the inside pocket, while it is very convenient and spacious, the material inside the fabric tears easily. Basically don't cram too much stuff into the inner pocket and you should be fine.P.S. The zippers on the front are just for show.

product_title: Uhomedecor Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese L Army Green
review_body: I love it!! I fit great if you selected the right size, I'm usually S but I had to order L

product_title: Hee Grand Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese XL Army Green
review_body: This jacket is so dope and comfortable! I wear a medium in US and ordered a XL. Love this jacket. Very nice!

product_title: Hee Grand Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese XL Army Green
review_body: The material is a little shinier and more like a wind jacket than canvas.  It's a dark green and like everyone says, runs small.  However, I had bought an XL from a different Chinese merchant and it fits perfectly.  This one is even smaller.  I am 5'9" and 175, with a muscular frame and wide shoulders and lats. I can get the coat on, but it's tight.  It's right on the border of fitting, but really will only do over a t shirt or lighter shirt.  I'm keeping it because it was cheap and still looks pretty good.  I bought it as an accessory rather than a functional jacket.  An XXL would have been perfect.

product_title: Hee Grand Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese XL Army Green
review_body: This jacket looks amazing! If you have mild winters like I do in California, then this is the perfect fall/winter jacket. Try not to wash it too much though, the zippers and stitching are cheaply made, and will fall off if not done carefully.

product_title: Hee Grand Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese XL Army Green
review_body: Get two sizes bigger, the arms are a bit short still but i love it

product_title: Hee Grand Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese XL Army Green
review_body: bought this for my boyfriend for a halloween costume. I read the reviews before buying, which was a good though cause I bought the next size up from his normal size (he normally wears a large, sometimes a medium but I bought a XL). It did the trick, and not bad quality for how cheap it is.

product_title: Hee Grand Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese XL Army Green
review_body: Nice jacket tho have to send it in for a bigger size

product_title: Hee Grand Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese XL Army Green
review_body: Product is good, but for me it's too small, am 173 cm height , so make sure before order, otherwise u lose all money,,,

product_title: Hee Grand Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese XL Army Green
review_body: I was taken.  The Chinese XL was way too small - more an US Medium.  And it's really not returnable, since it goes back to China.

product_title: Hee Grand Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese XL Army Green
review_body: Ordered the product on March 10th and i got the product on March 28th (not disappointed since the expected delivery date was April 21st). I'm from India and i usually go with Medium but i ordered XL and it was a bit small. Overall it was stylish and a good FALL jacket.

product_title: Hee Grand Mens Classic Winter Wind Jacket Chinese XL Army Green
review_body: Very nice jacket, so sad it was way too small. This company should Change their sizing policy, they must get a lot of returns.

product_title: Comfort Alley Women's Fashion Zip up Safari Anorak Military Jacket
review_body: I BOUGHT A SIZE LARGE AND I WEIGH 120 POUNDS, AND THE ARMS ARE TIGHT.

product_title: Comfort Alley Women's Fashion Zip up Safari Anorak Military Jacket
review_body: Great jacket! A must buy! It fits true to size and is lightweight. It is trendy and so cute. One of the buttons pulled off right away, but that doesn't take away from the product for me.

product_title: Comfort Alley Women's Fashion Zip up Safari Anorak Military Jacket
review_body: Great jacket, lightweight, fits true to size .. I'm 5"8 130 lbs and the med fits.. Just wish the sleeves were longer.. Tall girl problems

product_title: Comfort Alley Women's Fashion Zip up Safari Anorak Military Jacket
review_body: Loved it! Fits nice and a tad loose for layering. I'm 5'8" and usually wear a large!

product_title: Comfort Alley Women's Fashion Zip up Safari Anorak Military Jacket
review_body: Too small, Jacket was packed in a small envelope . Color was off Olive.

product_title: Comfort Alley Women's Fashion Zip up Safari Anorak Military Jacket
review_body: Just received this jacket today and wore it out for brunch.  Got a lot of compliments :) I'm 5'2 and 122 lbs. Size medium fit well.  Shipping was faster than expected.

product_title: Doublju Mens Unbalanced Blazer Jacket with China Collar
review_body: Bought this for my son, he loves the unbalanced style clothing. Fit great and the fabric is nice. We ordered the L, US m size. His chest is 37-38 and it fit perfect.

product_title: Doublju Mens Unbalanced Blazer Jacket with China Collar
review_body: Usually Asian L fits me perfectly but somehow, this doesn't fit me well

product_title: Doublju Mens Unbalanced Blazer Jacket with China Collar
review_body: I got a US medium and it fits perfectly I'm slim and 6'2. I'm happy with the purchase.

product_title: Doublju Mens Unbalanced Blazer Jacket with China Collar
review_body: This is very very small sizes.... This XL fits my very thin friend... Other than that, the package and product arrived okay....

product_title: Condor Men's Summit Soft Shell Tactical Jacket
review_body: A little bulky but it still was tight enough to not cause excessive baggyness

product_title: Condor Men's Summit Soft Shell Tactical Jacket
review_body: Great jacket, looks very professional. I'm 5'10, 190 and pretty fit, I ordered a medium and it fit as expected. If you're wearing a vest underneath I'd order a size larger as it is cut on the tighter side. Carried my personal weapon with a spare mag and set of cuffs with no printing issues using the inner zippered pockets.

product_title: Condor Men's Summit Soft Shell Tactical Jacket
review_body: Was looking for a jacket for a long time that fit right and was light but kept me warm. This jacket was perfect. I'm right between a medium and large in shirts and I ordered a medium and it fits great. Its extremely efficient at keeping me warm especially for a light jacket. I would highly recommend this jacket. The only thing I'm not a huge fan of is the collar does not flatten all the way, but it is close enough that it can be managable. Maybe making the hood fully detachable would be a good option if you don't plan on ever using it.

product_title: WantDo Men's Winter Sweatershirts Jacket Coat Two Sizes Smaller W03 (US Large Slim/ Tag Asia XXXL, Black High Quality)
review_body: Very comfy. Light cheap fabric, but looks good. Hood is too small.

product_title: WantDo Men's Winter Sweatershirts Jacket Coat Two Sizes Smaller W03 (US Large Slim/ Tag Asia XXXL, Black High Quality)
review_body: the jacket looks good, however the size i orderd was described as slim and it more of a regular fit.

product_title: WantDo Men's Winter Sweatershirts Jacket Coat Two Sizes Smaller W03 (US Large Slim/ Tag Asia XXXL, Black High Quality)
review_body: The product really does look like it does in the picture, but the Hoodie is cut very poorly. Not only does it fit very small, but it just fits awkward. In addition, the hood has a very nontraditional fit, which looks incredibly silly when actually worn. This is in addition to the fact that the material is the same material that you find in Halloween costumes (super cheap feeling) and the buttons are made of cheap plastic and seem to be dangling from a single piece of string.I'm not sure if this Hoodie is actually made to be worn, perhaps it really is a Halloween costume, made to be worn once.

product_title: Doublju Mens Unbalanced Blazer Jacket with China Collar
review_body: Took the advice and bought a size up.Desired size - MediumBought: Asian Large US Medium.Fits great!

product_title: Doublju Mens Unbalanced Blazer Jacket with China Collar
review_body: The jacket is very well made but the sizing isn't very accurate. I normally wear a US L but I read they run small so I ordered a US XL and it was still very snug, especially around the mid section. I wish they made it in XXL so it would fit perfect.

product_title: Match Mens Wool Classic Pea Coat Winter Coat (US XL/CN 3XL (Fit 42"-44"), Dark gray-Thick)
review_body: Asian sizes are waaaaayyyyyy too small but I got the closest to my boyfriends size but he says when he raises his arms the sleeve are just abit short but it's pretty sturdy for cold weather

product_title: J.TOMSON Womens Trendy Military Cotton Drawstring Anorak Jacket
review_body: Nice Jacket but it small so make sure you buy larger size

product_title: J.TOMSON Womens Trendy Military Cotton Drawstring Anorak Jacket
review_body: As other reviewers have stated, this jacket runs small so I bought a large when I usually wear a women's small in other shirts/jackets.  Since I sized up, it fits great!  Hits at the top of my hips (5'7, 130lbs).  The hood is actually big enough to cover my head (some other imports like this one have tiny, useless hoods), and the arms are long enough for my super long arms.  It's not lined, and feels a bit more like a heavy shirt, but for the price I really can't complain.

product_title: J.TOMSON Womens Trendy Military Cotton Drawstring Anorak Jacket
review_body: It fits everywhere, but is a little tight in the arms

product_title: J.TOMSON Womens Trendy Military Cotton Drawstring Anorak Jacket
review_body: True to size. A little shorter than i expected. But still love it

product_title: NI9NE Brand Grey Military Style Jacket Item #A882GY
review_body: This runs smaller than juniors sizing.  It was more like a little girls jacket.

product_title: NI9NE Brand Grey Military Style Jacket Item #A882GY
review_body: Sleeves didn't fit my mom too well but you can improvise.

product_title: NI9NE Brand Grey Military Style Jacket Item #A882GY
review_body: It's really cute. Just a bit loose fitting and the quality is not as sturdy and firm as it looks. It's a bit stretchy and light weight.  I will adjust it because I love it so much.

product_title: Men's 9 Pockets Work Utility Vest Military Photo Safari Travel Vest
review_body: Light fabric, lots of pockets. Even when the pockets are loaded, the vest does not look bulky or lumpy. Holds my wallet, phone, glasses, sunglasses, small Canon camera, notebook and keys.

product_title: Men's 9 Pockets Work Utility Vest Military Photo Safari Travel Vest
review_body: Comfy with lots of pockets.  Just what I needed.  Lightweight so good for warm weather.

product_title: Men's 9 Pockets Work Utility Vest Military Photo Safari Travel Vest
review_body: Like the fabric on this vest bought it for my husband and the fit was perfect like that it has many pockets looks like it would be great for travel

product_title: Men's Oblique Zipper Jacket Cosplay Costumes Hoodie II Coat
review_body: I bet that must of the men reviews on this product are fat and still live with their moms. This fits just perfect on me.

product_title: PattyBoutik Women's Zip Front Stand Collar Military Light Jacket
review_body: I ordered this in a XL after reading reviews that this fit a little snug. I normally wear M/L. The XL fits great even over a light shirt. I love this jacket, its super cool and fits great.

product_title: Chouyatou Men's Vintage Stand Collar Pu Leather Jacket
review_body: Im a tall slender guy and this fits great. If your a bigger guy I suggest getting one size larger to make sure it fits in the arms:)

product_title: Chouyatou Men's Vintage Stand Collar Pu Leather Jacket
review_body: Get a size up from what you normally get. I'm at 185lb white 5'11 guy and I got a large, fits great! The material is high quality and pockets are in the perfect place.It seems the fit is more for smaller torso-bigger arms type of guys, like many reviews point out.Lots of compliments on it, feels good! Would recommend

product_title: Chouyatou Men's Vintage Stand Collar Pu Leather Jacket
review_body: I liked the jacket but for my preference it fitted a bit large , I got a medium and it fits perfectly .

product_title: Ninimour- Korea Style Women's Blazer Jacket Suit Work Casual (L, white)
review_body: It was way too small, more liked for a small child...

product_title: Ninimour- Korea Style Women's Blazer Jacket Suit Work Casual (L, white)
review_body: Jacket is not long enough for me. I would've liked for it to hit at my belt line like the picture shows rather than mid waist. Otherwise the fit is fine.

product_title: TheLees (4BS) Mens Buckle Zipper Slim Hoodie Cotton Solid Short sleeve T-shirts
review_body: Sweet jacket. I wear a large so I got an XL in Asia size and fits a little small. So deffinately 2 sizes up if you like some room in your jackets

product_title: Doublju Mens Unbalanced Blazer Jacket with China Collar
review_body: Exactly what was expected a perfect fit for my skinny 13 year old who lives in bow ties!

product_title: Doublju Mens Unbalanced Blazer Jacket with China Collar
review_body: Fit is a little tighter than the American sizes listed. If you are in between sizes I would suggest going up one size.

product_title: Doublju Mens Unbalanced Blazer Jacket with China Collar
review_body: Sleek futuristic sci-fi design. I feel like I stepped out of a fashion magazine.

product_title: Doublju Mens Unbalanced Blazer Jacket with China Collar
review_body: Beautifully designed and a very nice style. Received lots of compliments.

product_title: NI9NE Brand Grey Military Style Jacket Item #A882GY
review_body: This jacket is great for over a business dress or with dress pants. The fit works great for layering and is of good quality. Just make sure your size matches with the size chart and it will fit just fine. It is a nice sturdy jacket, is even a bit heavy because of the quality. Great purchase!

product_title: VE34 TheLees Mens premium layered style slim vest waist coat
review_body: Bought this for my husband and he loved this. He's normally a US Large so I got him XL and it fit him well.

product_title: Match Mens Wool Classic Pea Coat Winter Coat
review_body: great product for the price. asian sizes do run very small but overall fits well.

product_title: Suit Vest, QinYing V-neck Sleeveless Slim Fit Jacket Men Business Waistcoat
review_body: Arrived earlier than anticipated and in perfect condition. The size chart recommendation is accurate. Two sizes bigger than what you want compensates the asian sizing adequately for non asian buyersAs for the item itself: The chain attached the the pocket gives you a very classy look and the material is comfortable to wear. The only thing I have to say I didn't like about this item is that the pockets are merely aesthetic.

product_title: Suit Vest, QinYing V-neck Sleeveless Slim Fit Jacket Men Business Waistcoat
review_body: Fits great.  I ordered two sizes up as I am a Medium.

product_title: U.S. Air Force Veteran Cap
review_body: very comfortable, soft and easy to resize in a second when the kids what to wear it.

product_title: Wantdo Men's Cotton Stand Collar Windbreaker Jacket US Medium PLUS Black
review_body: Order 1 size up. They run small from traditional north american sizes. It looks expensive. Fits well with one size up and very trendy. i love it.

product_title: Wantdo Men's Cotton Stand Collar Windbreaker Jacket US Medium PLUS Black
review_body: Looks good. Fits well. Quality product. Now blemishes or flaws. A little restrictive when I raise my arms but not more than a suit jacket. Would definitely buy again. Might even get another color anyway.

product_title: Wantdo Men's Cotton Stand Collar Windbreaker Jacket US Medium PLUS Black
review_body: Nice coat, too small gave to nephew as a gift, would have liked it for myself.

product_title: Condor Men's Summit Soft Shell Tactical Jacket
review_body: Excellent quality. Well worth the money. Fits perfect and looks great.

product_title: Condor Men's Summit Soft Shell Tactical Jacket
review_body: The fit of the jacket is a little tight but that's what I was looking for. If you want it to fit like a normal jacket then get a size bigger.

product_title: Moreto Men's Oblique Zipper Jacket Cosplay Costumes Hoodie Coat
review_body: I bought this for my teen grandson who wears it frequently.  It fits his lanky limbs perfectly.

product_title: H2H Mens Camo Patterned Waterproof Down Puffer Double Closed Hooded Jacket
review_body: Quality seems good and fits the reason I bought it but is much larger than a US medium. More like a US large

product_title: J.TOMSON Womens Trendy Military Cotton Drawstring Anorak Jacket
review_body: It was way too small for me. I am also tall. I also thought it would be heavier. But the style was cool

product_title: J.TOMSON Womens Trendy Military Cotton Drawstring Anorak Jacket
review_body: Amazing jacket! Fit true to size! Matches everything! Great for fall and winter :)

product_title: Landing Leathers Men's Air Force A-2 Leather Flight Bomber Jacket
review_body: I love it is nicebut not fit 100% okis like a person small and fat

product_title: Result Core Unisex Adult Windcheater Windproof Jacket
review_body: Exactly what my husband was looking for to wear over his uniform.  Light weight rain gear, he is very pleased.

product_title: Lanbaosi Men's 1 Button White Dress Suit Jacket and Pants Sets
review_body: Fits a bit tight. The material is thin, so it is great to wear in summer!The suit looks great, I ordered a Large and weigh about 150 lbs.

product_title: LCJB TheLees Mens Casual 2 Tone Plain Solid Double Zipper Hood Cotton Jacket
review_body: I ordered a Large(US Medium). I am usually a US Medium with some extra room, but this was a bit snug and the arms were a bit short. My international friend says Korean apparel usually runs very trim. Consider a size larger.

product_title: Suit Vest, QinYing V-neck Sleeveless Slim Fit Jacket Men Business Waistcoat
review_body: I put fit as expected but keep in mind the sizing is 2 sizes lower than US sizes.

product_title: Cocobla Mens Warm Hoodie Hooded Coat Classic Winter Outwear Down Jacket
review_body: When you order from an Asian Country their sizes run small, if you account for that they will fit fine. The coat itself was a good deal.

product_title: Chouyatou Men's Vintage Stand Collar Pu Leather Jacket
review_body: Great Jacket! I Ordered XL based on reviews saying it ran small. I am 6'2" and 190 lbs, long arms, like orangutan. The XL runs perfect. It's snug at tge misection so, if you have a gut, you may want to get a larger one or keep the zipper open.

product_title: Condor Men's Summit Soft Shell Tactical Jacket
review_body: I would order on the larger size to be safe-great jacket!

product_title: Condor Men's Summit Soft Shell Tactical Jacket
review_body: This softshell is a great lightweight jacket. It fits true to size. the micro fleece lining makes it comfortable. A great deal.

product_title: Condor Men's Summit Soft Shell Tactical Jacket
review_body: Bought it for my son who's about 6' tall.  His size is usually medium but I went with large on this jacket and it was a good call.  He's a weight lifter so he's big in his shoulders and small at hip and large fits him perfect.  Washed it once and it did not change size. Nice color but some of the dark stains are hard to get out.  I would have gone with darker color but he liked than one.

product_title: Suit Vest, QinYing V-neck Sleeveless Slim Fit Jacket Men Business Waistcoat
review_body: They said it would be a small fit.  But it is labeled XL.  Even my wife could not fit in it.

product_title: Members Only Men's Iconic Racer Jacket
review_body: I was happy to find this light weight jacket available and I am satisfied with the fit and the weight.

product_title: Mens Sports Athletic Body Armour Compression Under Layer Base Wear T-shirt Tops (Asia XL(US6), Black)
review_body: Fit, works, and good quality...just like the brand names but without the cost.

product_title: Columbia Men’s Steens Mountain Full Zip Fleece 2.0
review_body: My husband is a big guy as a Chinese, he is 179cm（5"10.5）, 100kg(220 lb), it is hard to buy him clothes, most Asian XXXL clothes are too slim for him. So I bought this one from USA, but this one (XL) is too spacious for him, the length is just good, but the width is too big. doesn't fit well.  He looks even fatter on this jacket. But he loves it, because the material is good, soft and thick and warm.

product_title: Condor Men's Alpha Tactical Fleece Jacket
review_body: Very well constructed, and perfect weight for year round California weather. I am 6-0, 174 lbs, 42 inch chest and the large fit perfectly.

product_title: Alternative Men's Rocky Zip Hoodie Sweatshirt
review_body: Fits very well, looks cool, quite warm although light and not thick.

product_title: Zeagoo Men's British Style Stand-collar Zipper Faux Leather Motorcycle Coat Jacket
review_body: Suppose to be US LARGE and came to b XXL , and still small.

product_title: Landing Leathers Men's Air Force A-2 Leather Flight Bomber Jacket
review_body: Very nice jacket at an unbelievable price. Quality appears to be the equivalent of jackets costing twice as much or more. I am 6 feet tall and 170lbs and the large tall fits perfect.

product_title: Landing Leathers Men's Air Force A-2 Leather Flight Bomber Jacket
review_body: Heavier than I expected, which is perfect for cold nights.  Great fit and finish.

product_title: OCHENTA Men's Winter Slim Fit Stand Up Collar Faux Leather Jacket
review_body: The fit and style is perfect. I needed a lightweight jacket and this is a great buy!

product_title: Envy Boutique Women's Military Button Hooded Fleece Belted Jacket
review_body: Fits a little loosely but that is perfect for sweater months

product_title: Wantdo Women's Lengthed Fur-Trimmed Hood Light Down Outwear Coat(Khaki,US 12)
review_body: What came was an Asian sizing 2XL, that fits more like a USA Medium. I saw from the description it was coming from Asia and expected much smaller sizes so I was not startled.  The appearance is wonderful. The stitched lines are flattering, not like so many of the puffy coats I see that are all stitched horizontal.  Horizontal anything is a no no in my book.  The angled stitches and criss cross stitches really make the coat look beautiful.  It is super soft.  It lost a star because I can give no feedback on warmth.

product_title: Duofold Men's Midweight Long-Sleeve T-Shirt
review_body: Extremely comfortable and warm enough without bulking me up a lot.

product_title: 32Degrees Weatherproof Men's Lightweight Water and Wind-Resistant Puffer Vest
review_body: Product was nicely made but I ordered an XL which was smaller than expected.

product_title: Landing Leathers Men's Air Force A-2 Leather Flight Bomber Jacket
review_body: Being a large person it's been hard to find a good quality, well fitting jacket. Until now. Nicely made, great fit, soft, comfortable, and a great price

product_title: Condor Men's Summit Soft Shell Tactical Jacket
review_body: My husband loves this jacket.  He is 5'11 and 250 lbs.  The XXL fits him nicely.  Only negative is the exposed zipped under the arms for the air vent.  It is only slightly annoying when he wears a short sleeve shirt under it.
